features: This sweatshirt represents the perfect combination of essential style and authentic sports heritage. Part of the exclusive Reverse Weave collection, it's crafted from prized Champion brushed fleece, a soft and durable fabric created with the brand's Reverse Weave technology introduced in 1934, which prevents shrinkage and deformation over time. Carefully crafted down to every detail and finished with the iconic C logo patch on the sleeve, it fully embodies Champion's authentic and timeless DNA.

We’ve reimagined the classic sweatshirt with a saddle shoulder cut. Raglan sleeves are nice, but have you seen this kind of shoulder? It combines comfort (allowing ease of movement) with a touch of style, as it’s a vintage detail that has unfortunately disappeared from most knits today due to its complexity in production.

Our gray sweatshirt is the lighter of the two - cut from a 400g/m² jersey compared to the black’s 500g/m² - but it’s still quite substantial by today’s standards, made with durability in mind. The loopback knit will soften beautifully over time, getting more and more comfortable with each wear and wash. Designing the cut, we aimed for a vintage-inspired silhouette that we love: slightly shorter length, designed to sit at the waist (preferably paired with high- or mid-rise trousers), with thick ribbing that helps the sweatshirt stay in place and gather just enough fabric to allow easy movement when you raise your strong arms.
Black drawstring shorts from Zara with linen. A comfortable and versatile option for hot weather, made from a cotton-linen blend.
Dark brown drawstring shorts from Massimo Dutti. A comfortable and versatile option for warm weather, made from a cotton-polyester blend for a bit of stretch.
Off-white fatigue shorts from Massimo Dutti. Made from a cotton-linen blend, these shorts feature large front pockets and a clean, classic look. Super-versatile in summer.
Adidas Busenitz sneakers in a tan and yellow colorway with a gum sole. A classic skate shoe that's also great for everyday wear.
Nike Air Max 90 sneakers in all black. A classic and versatile sneaker that provides comfort and style. This version combines mesh with leather patches.
Novesta German Army Trainers (GAT) replica sneakers in a white and grey colorway with a gum sole. A minimalist and luxurious take on a classic German army trainer.
Beige suede Venetian loafers by Mango. A comfortable and stylish slip-on shoe that can be dressed up or down.

model: Sk8-Hi Tapered Color Theory Honey Peach
features: Vans Sk8-Hi sneakers in a yellow and white colorway. A classic high-top skate shoe that's a staple of casual style. Unique and rare "honey peach" color.
Slim fit dark indigo selvedge jeans from Edwin. A versatile and stylish pair of jeans that can be dressed up or down. High-quality Japanese denim with a green ribbon in the selvedge.

Shirt made from our favorite Turkish chambray. It has a beautiful mid-blue shade and a dry, cool hand. It features a pointed yoke at the front and back, a rounded two-button sleeve cuff, and a rounded bottom hem. The cotton used for this garment is organic and when you buy this shirt, you can be sure we have paid our share of living wages.
Adidas Centennial C85 ADV Low sneakers in a grey suede with a gum sole. A classic skateboarding shoe that has become a streetwear staple.
Olive green suede espadrille loafers from Zara. A luxurious-looking and comfortable shoe for warm weather, with a relaxed Mediterranean flair.
Reebok Club C 85 vintage sneakers in off-white. A classic tennis shoe that has a timeless, vintage appeal.
Levi's 501 selvedge jeans in a classic medium wash with premium cotton. The original blue jean, a timeless and versatile wardrobe staple.

This new cut from the California-based crowdfunded denim maker is based on a pre-50s style — straight in the leg with a fuller thigh, higher rise, and roomy top block. Whether you want a more sophisticated look in the growing swathe of baggy denim options or think of these as a more relaxed silhouette to give your slim jeans a breather, they are the pinch hitter in any lineup.
Mango straight leg tapered jeans in washed blue. A great value option for a modern denim look for everyday looks.
